Brittney Griner.REUTERS/Brian Snyder
  • Brittney Griner could be brought home in a prisoner swap with a convicted Russian arms dealer, Russian media said.

articles.author: James Pearce
articles.title: Liverpool’s FA Cup hero Alisson: Much more than ‘the best goalkeeper in the world’ - The Athletic
articles.description: Not only did he save the crucial penalty against Chelsea, but Alisson has made an indelible mark on Liverpool history since joining.
articles.content:
Alisson dropped to his knees and pointed to the heavens.
